com.efnilite.redaktor

Class Editor<T extends org.bukkit.command.CommandSender>

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.efnilite.redaktor.Editor<T>
  • Type Parameters:
    T - The CommandSender to which changes need to be sent.

    public class Editor<T extends org.bukkit.command.CommandSender>
extends java.lang.Object
    The main editor for APIs and Players.

      • Editor

        public Editor(T sender)

      • Editor

        public Editor(T sender,
              int maxChange)

      • Editor

        public Editor(T sender,
              int maxChange,
              boolean sendUpdates)
        The recommended constructor if you want to specify every option.
        Parameters:
        sender - The instance to who to send messages if sendUpdates is true
        maxChange - The max amount of blocks that can be changed.
        sendUpdates - If there should be updates sent to the sender instance if an action is completed.

    • Method Detail

      • setBlocks

        public void setBlocks(CuboidSelection cuboid,
                      Pattern pattern)
        Set all blocks in a CuboidSelection to a certain material.
        Parameters:
        cuboid - The cuboid.
        pattern - The pattern the blocks need to be changed to.

      • setSlowBlocks

        public void setSlowBlocks(CuboidSelection cuboid,
                          Pattern pattern,
                          int perTick)
        Set all blocks slowly in a CuboidSelection to a certain material.
        Parameters:
        pattern - The pattern the blocks need to be changed to.
        cuboid - The cuboid.
        perTick - The amount of blocks that need to be changed per tick.

      • copyCuboid

        public void copyCuboid(CuboidSelection cuboid,
                       int x,
                       int z)
        Copies a CuboidSelection in a 2-dimensional way.
        Parameters:
        cuboid - The cuboid.
        x - The amount of times the cuboid needs to be copied in the x-value.
        z - The amount of times the cuboid needs to be copied in the z-value.
        See Also:
        for a 3D way of doing this.

      • copyCuboid

        public void copyCuboid(CuboidSelection cuboid,
                       int x,
                       int y,
                       int z)
        Copies a CuboidSelection in a 3-dimensional way.
        Parameters:
        cuboid - The cuboid.
        x - The amount of times the cuboid needs to be copied in the x-value.
        y - The amount of times the cuboid needs to be copied in the y-value.
        z - The amount of times the cuboid needs to be copied in the z-value.
        See Also:
        for a 2D way of doing this.

      • replace

        public void replace(CuboidSelection selection,
                    java.util.List<org.bukkit.block.data.BlockData> find,
                    Pattern replace)
        Replaces all blocks that match the 'find' Pattern to the 'replace' Pattern in a CuboidSelection
        Parameters:
        selection - The selection of where all blocks will be replaced.
        find - The BlockDatas that will be checked to match blocks.
        replace - The Pattern that it will be replaced by.

      • replaceAll

        public void replaceAll(org.bukkit.Location location,
                       int radius,
                       java.util.List<org.bukkit.block.data.BlockData> find,
                       Pattern replace)
        Replaces all blocks in a certain radius.
        Parameters:
        location - The center of where it will try to find blocks matching the first pattern.
        radius - The radius in which the code will search for blocks matching the first pattern.
        find - The BlockDatas it will check to see if it matches.
        replace - The Pattern the found blocks will be replaced by.

      • store

        public void store(com.efnilite.redaktor.selection.internal.HistorySelection selection)
        Adds a HistorySelection to the history. You can transform CuboidSelection to a HistorySelection with CuboidSelection.toHistory()
        Parameters:
        selection - The HistorySelection to be added to the history.

      • checkLimit

        public boolean checkLimit()
        Checks the change limit.

        The change limit can be used for restricting how many blocks a player (or an api) can edit.

        Returns:
        false if it is over the limit

      • send

        public void send(java.lang.String message)
        Sends a message to the Editor owner, if sendUpdates is true.
        Parameters:
        message - The message to be sent.
